## ThirdwebSDK.getSplit() method

Get an instance of a Splits contract

**Signature:**

```typescript
getSplit(address: string): Promise<import("..").SplitImpl>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description                          |
| --------- | ------ | ------------------------------------ |
| address   | string | the address of the deployed contract |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;import("..").[SplitImpl](./sdk.splitimpl.md)&gt;

the contract
